==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|か|そく|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かそく}}

# [[acceleration]]
#: {{ja-usex|この車は'''加速'''がよくない。|この くるま は '''かそく''' が よくない。|This car's '''acceleration''' is not good.}}

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|減速|げんそく}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|加速ポンプ|かそく ポンプ}}: an [[accelerator]] [[pump]], generally used in an [[internal combustion engine]]
* {{ja-r|加速器|かそくき}}: an [[accelerator]], such as a [[particle accelerator]]
* {{ja-r|加速車線|かそく しゃせん}}: an [[acceleration]] [[lane]], an [[onramp]], as on a [[highway]]
* {{ja-r|加速電圧|かそく でんあつ}}: an accelerating [[voltage]]
* {{ja-r|加速装置|かそく そうち}}: an [[accelerator]], such as a [[particle accelerator]]
* {{ja-r|加速度|かそくど}}: [[acceleration]], [[degree]] of acceleration
* {{ja-r|加速度的|かそくどてき}}: [[accelerative]]
* {{ja-r|加速度計|かそくどけい}}:　an [[accelerometer]]
* {{ja-r|加速度病|かそくどびょう}}: [[motion sickness]], [[kinetosis]]
{{der-bottom}}
